article_title: Katy Perry Hillary Clinton Iowa Rally 2016
article_text:
Election 2016

Why This GOP Woman Is #NeverTrump

Katrina Jørgensen has spent years of her life working to promote the Republican Party and conservative causes. But this week, the 30-year-old quit a leadership post in one of the most prominent political organizations for young GOP voters. The reason? Donald Trump

Torey Van Oot

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Ally Hickson
article_metadata.description: Katy Perry performed for Hillary Clinton supporters in Iowa and gave the former secretary of state the best birthday gift ever.

og.description:
